reviewText: This 3 DVD set is well worth buying; I laughed for HOURS off of these guys!  Joe Torry was really "buffed" when he did Def Jam and he was funny as hell!  Martin Lawrence as the MC of the Def Comedy Jam episodes was ALWAYS off the hook too!  You'll have hours of fun...make a party of it and invite your friends over to enjoy it with you!  You'll LOVE this collection!
